channel.title: How do you change the Login Screen?
channel.description: How do you change the Login Screen, Here is the image so you know what I mean... [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/834/loginscreene.png/][IMG]http://img834.imageshack.us/img834/9242/loginscreene.png[/img][/URL] Yes thats what i mean, the "Stone Slab" Part, and also the ingame "Bank" Background if anyone knows how to, the Client is "317 Delta"

item.title: How do you change the Login Screen?
item.dc:creator: @lilvamp11 lilvamp11
item.description:
@lilvamp11 wrote:

[quote=“ExtremeX-Scape™, post:3, topic:404352”]In side the main cache file, you will need Tom’s Cache suite to edit it, google it

after you open it and load the cache it will be in, View/Edit image archive’s > Title[/quote]
Thanks man i Downloaded it Successfully and am using it now, Thanks a bunch and Wish you Good luck on your Productions/Forum Help, Which ever you do, and if I had 15+ Rep, I’d Rep ++

EDIT: OK i have finished, Take a Look and Give me FeedBack, on what to Edit…

Read full topic
item.source: How do you change the Login Screen?

item.title: How do you change the Login Screen?

@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

In side the main cache file, you will need Tom’s Cache suite to edit it, google it

after you open it and load the cache it will be in, View/Edit image archive’s > Title

item.title: How do you change the Login Screen?
item.dc:creator: @tztk tztk
item.description:
@tztk wrote:

I believe you go into your sprites folder where ever it is located and replace the images of the pictures you want to change with new ones you are satisfied with.

EDIT: Also this is client-sided so if you are having client problems this most-likely isn’t the correct place to post.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you change the Login Screen?
